/* collab.statis.getStatisCurstList */
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
TaskStatus AS "GroupCol", CASE TaskStatus WHEN 'P' THEN '진행' WHEN 'C' THEN '완료' WHEN 'H' THEN '보류' ELSE '대기' END AS "GroupName"
c.UserCode AS "GroupCol", (SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, d.MultiDisplayName) FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER D WHERE D.UserCode = c.UserCode) AS "GroupName"
SectionSeq AS "GroupCol", (SELECT sectionName FROM COLLAB_SECTION c WHERE a.SectionSeq = c.SectionSeq) AS "GroupName"
, COUNT(*) as "TotCnt" , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus = 'W' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) "WaitCnt" , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus = 'P' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) "ProcCnt" , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus = 'H' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) "HoldCnt" , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus = 'C' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) "CompCnt" , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus != 'C' AND (b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) as "DelayCnt" , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.Label = 'I' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) as "ImpCnt" , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.Label = 'E' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) as "EmgCnt" , NVL(SUM(case when (b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) and b.TaskStatus = 'C' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) as "NowCompCnt" , NVL(SUM(case when b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) as "NowTotCnt" , case when SUM(case when b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') then 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 then round(NVL(SUM(case when (b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))) and b.TaskStatus = 'C' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) / NVL(SUM(case when b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') then 1 ELSE 0 END),0)*100,2) END as "ProcRate" FROM COLLAB_TASK_MAP a JOIN COLLAB_TASK b ON a.taskSeq = b.TaskSeq
RIGHT JOIN COLLAB_TASK_MEMBER c ON b.taskSeq = c.TaskSeq
WHERE a.PrjType = #{prjType} AND a.PrjSeq = #{prjSeq}
AND b.TaskName LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND b.Remark LIKE CONCAT'%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND b.TaskSeq IN (SELECT TaskSeq FROM COLLAB_TASK_TAG t WHERE b.taskseq = b.taskseq AND t.tagName LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%')
AND B.TaskName LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR B.Remark LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR b.TaskSeq IN (SELECT TaskSeq FROM COLLAB_TASK_TAG t WHERE b.taskseq = b.taskseq AND t.tagName LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%')
GROUP BY
TaskStatus
c.UserCode
SectionSeq
)
"GroupName"
"TotCnt" "WaitCnt" "ProcCnt" "HoldCnt" "DelayCnt" "ImpCnt" "EmgCnt" "CompCnt" "ProcRate" "GroupName"
ASC DESC

b.TaskStatus != 'C' AND b.Label = 'I' then b.taskSeq END) "ImpCnt" , COUNT(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus != 'C' AND b.Label = 'E' then b.taskSeq END) "EmgCnt" , COUNT(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus != 'C' AND (b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate < to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')) then b.taskSeq END) "DelayCnt" , COUNT(case when (b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')) and b.TaskStatus != 'C' bg.DeptCode = og.GroupCode AND MemberOf != 'NOUSE' LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.UserCode, b.taskSeq, b.EndDate, b.TaskStatus, b.Label, b.taskName, m.prjType, p.prjSeq, e.GroupId FROM collab_task_member a JOIN collab_task b ON a.taskSeq = b.TaskSeq AND b.parentkey=0 JOIN collab_task_map m ON m.taskSeq = b.TaskSeq LEFT JOIN collab_project p ON m.prjType = 'P' and m.prjSeq = p.prjSeq and p.PRJSTATUS in ('P')
